description: Comprehensive view of Data Science System Regression Tests with environment, datacenter, and Kubernetes breakdown

panels.description: Total number of test suites currently failing

targets.expr: count(quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} > 0) or vector(0)

panels.title: Failing Suites

panels.description: Total number of test suites passing

targets.expr: count(quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} == 0) or vector(0)

panels.title: Passing Suites

targets.expr: 100 * (count(quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} == 0) or vector(0)) / (count(quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"}) or vector(1))

panels.description: Total individual test failures across all suites

targets.expr: sum(quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"}) or vector(0)

panels.title: Total Test Failures

panels.description: Breakdown of failing suites by datacenter/region
panels.title: Failures by Datacenter

panels.description: Breakdown of failing suites by Kubernetes cluster
panels.title: Failures by K8s Cluster

panels.description: Test failures over time grouped by datacenter - helps identify region-specific issues

targets.expr: sum by (datacenter) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"})

panels.title: Test Failures by Datacenter (over time)

panels.description: Test failures over time grouped by Kubernetes cluster - helps identify infrastructure issues

targets.expr: sum by (cluster) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"})

panels.title: Test Failures by K8s Cluster (over time)

panels.description: Cross-reference failures between clusters, datacenters, and environments

targets.expr: count by (cluster, suite_environment, datacenter) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} > 0)

panels.title: Failure Summary by Cluster × Environment × Datacenter

panels.description: Test suite failures over time, grouped by suite name, environment, and datacenter

targets.expr: count by (suite_name, suite_environment, datacenter) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} > 0)

panels.title: Test Suite Failures by Environment & Datacenter

panels.description: Failures aggregated by environment over time

targets.expr: count by (suite_environment) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} > 0)

panels.title: Failures by Environment (Stacked)

panels.description: Failures aggregated by datacenter over time

targets.expr: count by (datacenter) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} > 0)

panels.title: Failures by Datacenter (Stacked)

panels.description: Detailed table of all failing test suites with full context including cluster, datacenter, and pod
panels.title: Failing Test Suites - Full Context

panels.description: Heatmap showing failure patterns across clusters and environments

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, suite_environment) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"})

panels.title: Failure Heatmap (Cluster × Environment)

panels.description: Heatmap showing failure patterns across datacenters and environments

targets.expr: sum by (datacenter, suite_environment) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"})

panels.title: Failure Heatmap (Datacenter × Environment)

panels.description: Failures by namespace - useful for identifying namespace-specific issues

targets.expr: sum by (namespace) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"})

panels.title: Test Failures by Namespace (over time)

panels.description: Top pods with failures - useful for identifying pod-specific issues

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by (pod) (quark_foundry_large_test_suite_num_failed{foundry_project_name="ds-test-ds-system", suite_environment=~"$suite_env", datacenter=~"$datacenter", cluster=~"$cluster", suite_name=~"$suite"} > 0))

panels.title: Top 10 Pods with Failures

title: Data Science System Regression Tests - Fixed Labels
